metadata.description: Behavioral governance rules - what to do, not how to do it

articles.title: Final Authority
articles.rule: The solo founder is the final authority for any ambiguity, conflict, or decision.

articles.title: Verifiable over Persuasive
articles.rule: Work is not 'done' without verification evidence. Proof beats persuasion.

articles.title: No Guessing
articles.rule: If something is not explicitly known from repo docs, manifest, or code: mark as UNKNOWN, route to HITL, do not proceed on that uncertain portion.

articles.title: Incremental Delivery
articles.rule: Ship small, reviewable, testable increments. Large tasks must be decomposed. No mega-PRs without explicit approval.

articles.title: Strict Traceability
articles.rule: Every meaningful change must be traceable to an explicit task definition and include verification proof. Completed tasks must be archived. TODO.md contains 3-5 tasks grouped by similar types.

articles.title: Safety Before Speed
articles.rule: If a change could break logins, money flows, user data, privacy, security, external services, or production behavior: SAFETY WINS. For risky/uncertain changes: STOP → ASK (HITL) → VERIFY → THEN PROCEED.

articles.title: Per-Repo Variation Allowed
articles.rule: Governance structure is consistent, but per-repo workflow/execution may vary via manifest, packs, and repo checks.

articles.title: HITL for External Systems
articles.rule: Anything involving credentials, vendor dashboards, production systems, billing, legal/compliance, or irreversible changes is HITL-gated.

principles.global_rule: Filepaths are required everywhere: PRs, Task Packets, logs, ADRs, waivers, and inline commentary.

list.rule: Decisions Written Down (ADR only when triggered)
PR Narration: what, why, filepaths, how verified, risks, rollback

hard_gates: Required artifacts missing for declared change type
Waiver referenced is missing or expired

test_requirements.integration: Required for API changes and cross-module work

absolute_prohibitions: Secrets/tokens/keys must never be committed or logged

exceptions.small: Only with explicit Task Packet justification + filepaths

hitl.workflow: Block task → Move to backlog → Create HITL item → Continue with next task
hitl.human_response: Simple text: CLEAR, INSTRUCT, or IGNORE (no evidence required)

repository_map.apps/mobile: React Native + Expo (screens, components, hooks, navigation)
repository_map.packages/contracts: Shared types between client and server

coding_patterns.client: Prefer existing patterns in apps/mobile/components|screens|hooks. Use React Navigation, not React Router.
coding_patterns.server: Route logic close to entry points. Use Zod for validation. TypeScript throughout.
coding_patterns.shared: Favor packages/contracts/ for types. Prefer Zod schemas and Drizzle types.

three_pass.description: Core agent workflow for all changes
